title: Control the Elder Brain
content:
ion. You will have the following dialogue options.

Better yet, you'll be her Chosen again. Why do you care what Mystra thinks? Keep the Crown and you could be a god. Are you sure you're ready to give up such powers? You'll never have the chance again.

Choosing dialogue 1 will reveal that Gale is appreciative of his journey with you. Wyll also agrees to having a celebration. You will have the following dialogue options.

A celebration sounds perfect. We should stay in the city. Help to rebuild
